title: $1049 -- Costa Rica: 7-Day Vacations, Inc. Air, Hotels, Tours, Transfers
text:
Home > Vacation Package Deals > $1049 -- Costa Rica: 7-Day Vacations, Inc. Air, Hotels, Tours, Transfers $1049 -- Costa Rica: 7-Day Vacations, Inc. Air, Hotels, Tours, Transfers by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff - October 2, 2015 at 5:56 PM Tweet 
With its "7 Day Classic Costa Rica" package, Gate 1 Travel is cutting rates on six-night vacation packages to the popular Central American nation. This city/national park/coffee farm adventure rates start at $1049 per person with airfare, accommodations, tours via air-conditioned motor coach, most meals, entrance fees, and hotel taxes. 
The deal includes: Round-trip airfare from Miami; other departure cities are available at varying rates Airline taxes and fuel surcharges Two nights' accommodations in San Jose Two nights' accommodations in Arenal Two nights' accommodations in Monteverde Hotel porterage
